name: NINJ'EM UP !
description:
In "NINJ'EM UP!" You have to get the highest score by shooting or grabbing the scrolls.

In this arcade game, you must collect a maximum of points by grabbing or shooting the scrolls. Getting to a very high score the game will change your mode. 

The longer you play, the more difficult the game becomes. 3 difficulty threshold. Could you you achieve it ?

This game has controller compatibility.

CONTROLS :

LEFT ARROW and RIGHT ARROW to move. 

BUTTON "C" to jump. 

BUTTON "X" to shoot.

TOOLS USED :

PICO-8

DEVELOPER :

Martin JOUBERT itch.io - Instagram - Twitter - YouTube

This game  was made for 4MB Jam - itch.io.
